Package TP

Class Problem

java.lang.Object
TP.Problem
public class Problem
extends java.lang.Object
A class describing the Transportation Problem, alongside its sources, destinations and costs of transportation.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Adrian Peterca

    (package private) java.util.ArrayList<Cost> costs  
    (package private) Destination[] destinations

    A simple function that prints the matrix representing the Sources, Destinations, the demands and supplies, along with the cost for each transportation.

    • costs

      java.util.ArrayList<Cost> costs

    • sources

    • destinations

      Destination[] destinations

  • Constructor Details

    • Problem

      public Problem​(Source[] sourceArray, Destination[] destinationArray)
      The constructor for an instance of the TP.
      Parameters:
      sourceArray - represents an array of fixed size of different sources.
      destinationArray - represents an array of fixed size of different destinations.

  • Method Details

    • addCost

      public void addCost​(Source s, Destination d, java.lang.Integer cost)
      Public method for adding the transportation cost between a given Source and a given Destination. The given Source and Destination must exist in the problem.
      Parameters:
      s - the given Source object
      d - the given Destination object
      cost - the cost between them

    • printMatrix

      public void printMatrix()
      A simple function that prints the matrix representing the Sources, Destinations, the demands and supplies, along with the cost for each transportation.

    • getCostFromTo

      public java.lang.Integer getCostFromTo​(Source from, Destination to)
      Public method for getting the cost of transportation between a Source and a Destination.
      Parameters:
      from - the Source from where to start
      to - the Destination object
      Returns:
      the cost between them

    • getSourceIndex

      public Source getSourceIndex​(int index)

    • getDestinationIndex

      public Destination getDestinationIndex​(int index)
